Contact Me

If you're a horror author who would like a book review or if you're a horror enthusiast who has a movie or TV show recommendation for me, fill out this form and I'll get back to you as soon as possible!

Please note: Movie/TV Show recommendations need to be on one of the following services:

  • HBOMAX
  • Shudder
  • Hulu
  • Netflix
  • Tubi
  • Peacock
  • Paramount+
  • YouTube (Free on YouTube)
  • Discovery+ (Documentaries)
